name: Call Now – Group Contact Buttons – PHT Blog
author: Pham Huu Thanh

sections.description:
Insert quick call buttons, chat Facebook, Skype, Line, quick contact via Zalo, Viber, Contact Form 7 … all wrapped up in a Group Contact button neatly displayed. The plugin is completely free for WordPress websites.

Currently the Plugin is providing the following display functions that allow website owners to customize:

  1. Customize phone number
  2. Customize your Facebook ID to make chat on Messenger
  3. Customize chat via Zalo, Viber, Skype, Line…
  4. Customize Shortcode Contact Form
  5. Add embed code: Google Analytics, verification tag, embed code css, js, script code, meta tags…

Empty fields mean the corresponding function button is hidden.

Need support

If you want to get support, please visit PHT Blog for more detail.
sections.installation:
1. Upload folder \’group-contact-buttons\’ v√†o wp-content/plugins
  2. Activate the plugin in the area Plugins -> Installed Plugins
  3. Go to the Group Contact on the left side of the Menu to install.
sections.faq:
Does the plugin upgrade to the paid version and require users to pay?

The plugin is completely free, we will not upgrade to any paid version. However, users can support the group through the Donate function.

Can I hide the information boxes next to the button. Only the button will appear to reduce confusion?

Absolutely OK. You stick in the box Hide text in settings.

Does the plugin install malicious code or hidden links?

The plugin complies with WordPress.org’s rules and has been moderated. We are committed not to use plugins for the purpose of inserting links that are harmful to your website. If it detects an unnecessary link please respond to us to be removed.
